name: Portal Pong (Draconis_Eltanin)
description:
Created as part of a challenge to create a game every month for the year. 

This is a variation on the classic pong formula: the two paddles are orthogonal, a point is scored every time the ball bounces after touching the paddles. If the ball hits the sides it will be redirected, if it hits the center it will be teleported to the other paddle. 

Controls: 

  • Arrows to move the paddles
  • X to start or restart after a game over

Feedback is always appreciated in the comments.
